snippet: Police departments, the Federal Communications Commission and the wireless phone industry have devised a plan to fight cellphone theft: a central database to track stolen phones and prevent them from being used again, Edward Wyatt reports in...
abstract: Police departments, the Federal Communications Commission and the wireless phone industry have devised a plan to fight cellphone theft: a central database to track stolen phones and prevent them from being used again, Edward Wyatt reports in Tuesday's New York Times.

headline.main: Daily Report: Fighting Cellphone Theft With a Database
